lines.text: By the way, Elvis, did you ever, ah, mess around with Marilyn Monroe?
Well, the Kennedys did, you know. Hoover played me the tape.
Well, gee, Mr. President, I kinda wish I had a tape of this meetin', so I could play it for muh wife and muh little daughter.
You know there are no coincidences in this universe, man. Everything happens for a reason.
Hmm, maybe I should add the Beatles to my "enemies list."
